page.title: 04Family Trees
page.content:
{Tracing your ancestors}is very popular nowadays. It is quite difficult to trace a long way back in Sheffield, because it is a city which has grown very quickly. People came from all around to live here.
When you start your family tree, you start by asking your parents and grandparents if they know of any relatives you do not know about.
After this you go to the Central Library and search in the Local Archives. The Registers of Electors and Burgess Rolls for the appropriate years can be very helpful. You have to take great care with the books, and you can only use a pencil in that room.
